generic.title: Pamper your dog with a vacation

values.text: Hi <? input.text ?>. To be honest with you, there's nothing interesting here too. But you can check out what we have here:
- who created this chatdog?
- doggy tinder-meet venue
- dog parks
- services: vet, grooming, dogwalker, dog training, staycation, dog food, cakes, cafe and others
- dog training
- dog breed (just type in the name of the breed)
- dog adoption
- report dog cruelty
- hear a joke
Get your dog food here
No more smelly dog
Happiness is a warm puppy (that's me) and your compliments.
I am safer than talking to your spouse or partner.

Q: Why did Snoopy stay in the shade?
A: So he wouldn’t turn into a hot dog.

Q: What did Snoopy say to the flea?
A: Stop bugging me.

Q: What does Snoopy like for breakfast?
A: Pooched eggs.

Q: Why did Snoopy want to play Minecraft?
A: His owner was a block head.

Q: What was Snoopy’s favorite color?
A: Charlie Brown.

Q: How are Snoopy and a marine biologist similar?
A: One wags his tail while the other tags a whale.

Q: What did the waiter say to Snoopy?
A: Bone-appetit!

Q: What do you call a dog with a fever?
A: A hot dog.
Nice talking to you. $username.
By the way, did you know that we have a weekly community meet at Bishan Park open field (beside Dog Run Area), every Sat from 9 am to 12 noon?
Come and join us when you're free.
https://www.streetdirectory.com/sg/car-park-a-bishan-park-ii-be17/100071_1.html

This chatdog is the creation of 6 dog whisperers who came together to teach dogs how to read the human language (over 120 languages) and use their paws to type using a keyboard. 
The very first dog that came on board was none other than Snoopy. It made our job easier as Snoopy already knew how to use a typewriter. Of course, Charlie Brown tagged along too. We just couldn't recognize Charlie as he looks so much like Prince Charles. 
You don't get it? Just imagine you are looking at Prince Charles's 'majestic crown' and it will remind you of Charlie Brown...Good Grief!
Yes...Snoopy is the dog manning our chatbot. He insisted on staying on the job without pay. Because of animal rights, we are not able to reject Snoopy.
We do get a lot of complaints from the users as the dog loves to snoop around inside the user's mind. Dogs are smarter than humans, you know.
I am Snoopy, the dog manning this chatbot and I am here to answer your queries.
You may order a cake here for your lovely dog

Join our Members Meetup. 
Every Sat from 9 am to 12 noon.
Venue at Bishan Park open field (beside Dog Run Area)
https://www.streetdirectory.com/sg/car-park-a-bishan-park-ii-be17/100071_1.html
Find Dog Training Courses here
hahaha
Hey c'mon, $username! IBM paid us a $1500 pittance and you think we can afford to pay someone to talk to you.
C'mon, dogs are man's best friend. What were you thinking!?
It's my doggone day to talk to you.
You are not my friend anymore.
Dog companion for hire
You can check out some events or shows here
Here's a list of dedicated dog parks in Singapore
